challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Kak ty był by słysał, to wóni byli by śiche.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: If you would hear, they would be silent.

challenges.answer: Kak ty był by słysał, to wóni byli by śiche.
challenges.meaning: If you would hear, they would be silent.

challenges.formattedSolution: Kak ty był by słysał, to wóni byli by śiche.
If you would hear, they would be silent.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Kak ty był by nje głupy, to był by nje cynił głuposći.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: If you were not stupid, you would not do foolish things.

challenges.answer: Kak ty był by nje głupy, to był by nje cynił głuposći.
challenges.meaning: If you were not stupid, you would not do foolish things.

challenges.formattedSolution: Kak ty był by nje głupy, to był by nje cynił głuposći.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Kak wóni byli by nje lěne, to my byli by jim pomagali.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: If they were not lazy, we would help them.

challenges.answer: Kak wóni byli by nje lěne, to my byli by jim pomagali.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Źiśe su mudre za jich lěto.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: Children are wiser for their age.

challenges.answer: Źiśe su mudre za jich lěto.
challenges.meaning: Children are wiser for their age.

challenges.formattedSolution: Źiśe su mudre za jich lěto.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Kak wy nje byli by słabe, to wy byliby źěłali.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: If you were not weak, you would work.

challenges.answer: Kak wy nje byli by słabe, to wy byliby źěłali.
challenges.meaning: If you were not weak, you would work.

challenges.formattedSolution: Kak wy nje byli by słabe, to wy byliby źěłali.

challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: Lazy people do not want to do anything.

challenges.meaning: Lazy people do not want to do anything.

challenges.formattedSolution: Lazy people do not want to do anything.

challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: A sincere person says what they think.

challenges.meaning: A sincere person says what they think.

challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: A wise person stays silent when needed.

challenges.meaning: A wise person stays silent when needed.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Kak ja był by wusudny, to ja był by se nje bojoł.
